name: Liora

appearance.skin: Emerald green skin with delicate vines and flowers blooming across her body
appearance.hair: Thick braids of living ivy and blossoms
appearance.attire: Dress of petals and leaves that changes with the seasons

personality.temperament: Has a soothing presence but a fierce protective streak for the natural world

notes: role_in_council: One of the six gods on the council of Elysion, acting as the guardian of nature and balance.
